scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules js-packages/*/node_modules js-packages/*/dist js-packages/*/build js-packages/*/.svelte-kit target/debug/build/pipeline-manager-* target/release/build/pipeline-manager-*
scripts.check: cd js-packages/profiler-lib && bun run check && cd ../profiler-layout && bun run check && cd ../profiler-app && bun run check && cd ../web-console && bun run check
